text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The day before tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I'm so sorry for stoppingyou, but I'm in search of someone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki informs me that she can't<n>find one of the
students under her<n>care. Unfortunately, I have no idea<n>
where to look...
choice_data_list: I'm sorry. I haven't seen her.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I see... Well, thank you anyway. If you<n>do happen to find her,
would you tell<n>her to contact me right away?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
No need to say how—every member<n>of Ritto dorm knows my
details. Thank<n>you again! Now, I must be off.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Junior A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, wasn't that Fuji? I wonder why<n>she was in such a
hurry.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Junior B
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, a student from Ritto<n>hasn't been seen all day. I
heard she<n>might've snuck off and run away<n>from school.

text_block_list.name: Junior Student A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, well, that's not super rare, huh...<n>Wait, so Fuji's been
looking since<n>morning?! The tryouts are tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Junior Student B
text_block_list.text:
I know, right? I wonder if she'll be<n>able to train at all... But
it's her we're<n>talking about. I'm sure she'll be fine.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Try as I might to find a student fitting<n>the description Fuji
gave me, my<n>search ends in failure.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Meanwhile, it's already grown dark<n>outside.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Trainer?! What on earth are you doing<n>here? And you're
drenched in sweat...
choice_data_list: I wanted to help with the search.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Is that so? You're very kind... Thank<n>you for helping out.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'm afraid to say, this park is the only<n>place left unchecked—

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Junior C
text_block_list.text: Sniffle...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Wait! Did you hear that? Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Good evening, my darling pony. And<n>what might you be
doing in such a<n>lonely place?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Junior C
text_block_list.text:
Huh? F-Fuji?! But, why are you<n>here?! You should be
preparing for<n>your race tomorrow, not worrying<n>about me!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I needn't worry about you? Why<n>would you say such a
thing? I mean,<n>you're one of my dearest friends at<n>the
academy.

text_block_list.name: Junior Student C
text_block_list.text:
No way! I... I'm no good to anyone<n>here. I'm not fit to be at
this school<n>anymore.

text_block_list.name: Junior Student C
text_block_list.text:
The training's way too hard for me. I<n>just wanna see my
family... All my<n>motivation to race disappeared like a<n>puff
of smoke!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Your motivation to race... I see.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Don't you want to try reclaiming that<n>feeling? Or would you
rather throw this<n>all away and go home?

text_block_list.name: Junior Student C
text_block_list.text: I-I dunno...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Junior C
text_block_list.text: I mean, I'd like to get the feelingback, if I can... Running in realraces has always been my dream,but—

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Then it's decided! If that is your wish,<n>then I shall make it
come true.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Watch me—I'll have you remember<n>your motivation. All of it.
In the tryouts<n>tomorrow, I'll show you a real<n>miracle!

text_block_list.name: Junior Student C
text_block_list.text: A miracle?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I mean it. So come on... let's get back<n>to the dorm.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Through an inspiring promise of a<n>miracle, Fuji Kiseki
manages to bring<n>the student safely home.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Geez... My nerves are shot, Fuji. I<n>thought we lost you too.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! Forgive me! But I thank you,<n>Hishiama, for
watching over things<n>while I was gone.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: And Trainer, your efforts were<n>heartening to see!
choice_data_list: I'm just glad we found your friend.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Come on, it's almost lights-out. Get to<n>bed already. You've
got that race<n>tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You missed a whole day of training,<n>but I wouldn't sweat it.
It'd take more<n>than a day to throw you out of shape.<n>Just
concentrate on restin' up.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ...Will do.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Don't get any funny ideas or<n>anything, 'kay? Good night.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Yes, good night.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I part ways with the two and return to<n>my room, but I can't
help worrying<n>about how Fuji was acting...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
For I am Fuji Kiseki—the entertainer<n>who brings joy to all!
At least, that is<n>the ideal I wish to become.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I'll put on a miracle of a performance<n>that will make
everyone smile!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: For I... am the miracle of the turf, Fuji<n>Kiseki!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Watch me—I'll have you remember<n>your motivation. All of it.
In the tryouts<n>tomorrow, I'll show you a real<n>miracle!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She wants so badly to entertain and<n>thrill people. I hope
she's staying calm<n>about this...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unable to shake my strange hunch, I<n>go to make sure
Fuji's resting.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What a jerk! She looked too calm—I<n>knew she'd do
somethin' dumb like<n>this!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you. You're that trainer who<n>was with Fuji, aren't
ya?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, only her drivin' me into a rage!<n>She vanished without a
trace. It's one<n>thing for the others to break curfew,<n>but a
dorm leader? Unforgivable!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It's good that you're here,<n>though—we're after the same
thing.<n>Let's split up.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Lemme think where she loves to<n>train... There's down by
the river, the<n>shrine...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After thinking of all the places she<n>could be, Hishi Amazon
and I split up<n>to look for Fuji Kiseki.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Finally...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Huh... T-Trainer?!
